Name: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
description: LAND, LOOT, SURVIVE! Play PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS for free. Secure strategic positions on various battlegrounds and acquire weapons and equipment to fight for survival as the last person standing. Team up with friends and challenge the tense experience that only PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS, the pioneer of the battle royale genre, can offer.
smail_info: Introducing PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS, available for free!

Name: The First Descendant
description: The First Descendant is a high-quality graphic 3rd person cooperative shooting action RPG game that you can play for free.
smail_info: Witness the high-quality graphics and endless possibilities of The First Descendant!

Name: ELDEN RING
description: A vast world where open fields with a variety of situations and huge dungeons with intricate and three-dimensional designs are seamlessly connected. As you explore, the joy of discovering unknown and overwhelming threats awaits, leading to a high sense of accomplishment.
smail_info: Experience open fields and complex dungeons!
processor: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB

Name: Eternal Return
description: On the secluded island of Lumia, the scientific group Aglaia is conducting secret survival experiments on humans to become a new species.
smail_info: Witness Aglaia's efforts to become a new species!
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580

Name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in Baldur's Gate 3. A story of fellowship, betrayal, sacrifice, survival, and the lure of absolute power awaits.
smail_info: Experience the Forgotten Realms!

Name: DJMAX RESPECT V
description: Do not strive for perfection in this game. Baldur's Gate 3 respects and accepts all your choices.
smail_info: Experience Baldur's Gate 3!

Name: Dota 2
description: The most played game on Steam. Every day, millions of players worldwide jump into battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. Whether you've played for 10 hours or 1,000 hours, there is always something new to discover. Regular updates ensure that the game evolves constantly, and Dota 2 lives on with its own vibrant energy.
smail_info: Experience Dota 2!

Name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City. As a cyberpunk mercenary, you must fight for survival. With improvements and new free content, complete missions to build your reputation and unlock upgrades to create your own character and playstyle. Your relationships and choices will shape the world around you. Night City is where legends are born.
smail_info: Experience Cyberpunk 2077!

Name: Palworld
description: With the mysterious creatures called Pals, you can live a leisurely life or engage in deadly battles against poachers. Pals can be sent into combat, bred, assist in agriculture, work in factories, sold, or disassembled for food.
smail_info: Experience Palworld!

Name: Football Manager 2024
description: In Football Manager 2024, the most complete edition to date, become a true leader to write your own football history. Whether you love starting from the bottom or prefer chasing immediate glory, the perfect challenge awaits. With the release of the new Meiji Yasuda Insurance Ltd J. League license, for the first time ever, compete in the J1 League, J2 League, J3 League, and pioneer new horizons in Japanese football. Wherever you manage, it's up to you to build a team capable of competing with the world's elite.
smail_info: Experience the FIFA rankings!

Name: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree
description: ELDEN RING is an action RPG title set in a vast dark fantasy world where you can enjoy a highly degree of freedom in your adventures. It has received high acclaim worldwide, including winning the Game of the Year at The Game Awards and the Ultimate Game of the Year at the Golden Joystick Awards. In the downloadable content 'Shadow of the Erdtree', a new story unfolds on the stage of the 'Shadowlands' filled with mysteries and discoveries, threats and challenges.
smail_info: Experience Elden Ring!

Name: Chained Together
description: Dive into the epic adventure of Chained Together. Start your journey chained together with companions in the depths of hell. Your mission is to climb as high as possible to escape from hell.
smail_info: Experience Chained Together!

Name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: One day, a small-time thug, a retired bank robber, and a deranged psychopath realize they are deeply entangled in the most terrifying and bizarre elements of the criminal underworld, U.S. government, and entertainment industry. To survive in a ruthless city where no one can be trusted, not even each other, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists.
smail_info: Experience Grand Theft Auto V!

Name: Sid Meier Civilization VI
description: Developed by legendary game designer Sid Meier, the Civilization series is a turn-based strategy game where you build an empire to stand the test of time. Become the ruler of the world by establishing and leading a civilization from the Stone Age to the Information Age. Wage war, conduct diplomacy, advance your culture, and go head-to-head with history's greatest leaders as you try to build the greatest civilization the world has ever known.
smail_info: Experience the Sid Meier series!

Name: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley is a farming simulator video game developed and published by Paradox Interactive. The game is set in a fantasy world where players control a farming community known as the player character, and must complete various tasks to earn money and power. The game features a wide range of characters, weapons, and environments, and is available on PC, consoles, and mobile devices. The game has a unique combat system that allows players to use a combination of melee and ranged weapons to defeat enemies. The game also features a unique ability system that allows players to unlock new abilities as they progress through the game. The game is free-to-play and can be played without an account. The game is available in several languages, including English, German, French, and Spanish. The game is currently available on PC, consoles, and mobile devices.
smail_info: Experience Stardew Valley!

Name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
description: A world of skies filled with colorful islands. The protagonist, along with their trusty small dragon companion Vyrn and a girl with mysterious powers named Lyria, meets many friends and continues their journey to the legendary island of Estalucia at the ends of the sky. The story of this title begins with the protagonist and company visiting the 'Zega Grande Skydom' located in a vast sky world. Encountering 'Primal Beasts' that guard the islands with immense power, and facing the secretive organization 'Avia Order' that operates across the skydom, the protagonist's party faces adventures, battles, conspiracies, and immense fates that engulf the entire skydom.
smail_info: Experience Granblue: Relink!

Name: TEKKEN 8
description: With revamped character visuals and the precision of cutting-edge hardware, TEKKEN battles reach new heights. The texture quality of water droplets sliding down the skin, swaying hair, and throbbing muscles, combined with the vivid backgrounds and destructible stages, create an unprecedented sense of presence.
smail_info: Experience TEKKEN 8!

Name: Destiny 2
description: Jump into the world of Destiny Guardians and explore a mysterious solar system and experience first-person shooter combat. Unlock powerful elemental abilities, collect unique gear to customize your Guardian's look and playstyle. Play the cinematic story, challenging co-op missions, and a variety of PvP modes alone or with friends. Download today for free and leave your legend among the stars.
smail_info: Experience Destiny 2!

Name: Torchlight: Infinite
description: In the new season, hunters can defeat clockwork summons to collect clockwork coupons to exchange for club's grand rewards!
smail_info: Experience Torchlight: Infinite!

Name: DAVE THE DIVER
description: The beautiful underwater world filled with numerous species of fish and gigantic creatures. Are you curious about the marine creatures that might appear anywhere? Evade the attacks of threatening creatures and obtain fresh ingredients. The underwater world is full of mysteries, with a fantastic marine ecosystem and ancient artifacts.
smail_info: Experience DAVE THE DIVER!

Name: Project Zomboid
description: Project Zomboid is a third-person shooter video game developed and published by Czech game development studio Nexon. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where the player takes on the role of a man who has been trapped in a virtual reality world for years, and must use their wits and skills to escape before the world is destroyed. The game features a wide range of gameplay elements, including a unique combat system, a unique ability system, and a unique environment. The game is available on PC, consoles, and mobile devices, and is free-to-play. The game is currently available in English, German, French, and Spanish.
smail_info: Experience Project Zomboid!

Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Master Duel
description: The definitive digital card game of 'Yu-Gi-Oh!' that has evolved over more than 20 years! The ultimate duel awaits you! Can you keep up with this duel?
smail_info: Experience Yu-Gi-Oh! Master Duel!

Name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG set in the Harry Potter universe. Discover magical creatures, customize your character, brew potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents, and explore familiar and new locations while becoming the wizard you've always dreamed of.
smail_info: Experience Hogwarts Legacy!

Name: Ready or Not
description: The LSPD in Los Suenos has announced a surge in violent crime throughout the Los Suenos area. In response, a SWAT team has been deployed to handle extremely dangerous situations, including hostage situations, bomb threats, and barricaded suspects. Citizens are advised to exercise extreme caution when moving or to stay safely at home.
smail_info: Experience Ready or Not!

Name: Once Human
description: Due to the great disaster, everything from humans to animals and plants have changed, infected by an alien lifeform called Stardust. As a meta-human, you can survive and harness the power of Stardust in this environment. Fight, build, and explore alone or with others. As the world plunges into chaos, you are the last hope.
smail_info: Experience Once Human!

Name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description: Become the enhanced mercenary V and embark on dangerous espionage missions and a rescue operation for the NUSA president. Always stay alert in Dogtown. This area is full of secrets and opportunities, but only those who will do anything to achieve their goals can seize those opportunities. Espionage missions are very dangerous, and failure is not an option. Choose your allies carefully and uncover hidden secrets.
smail_info: Experience Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty!

Name: Last Epoch
description: Last Epoch is an action RPG game that features time travel, heart-pounding dungeon crawling, and endless character customization, making it enjoyable for both seasoned and new players. Travel through the past of Eterra, face the dark empire and wrathful gods, and encounter untamed wilderness. Save time from the void.
smail_info: Experience Last Epoch!

Name: Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice
description: In Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice, you become the 'one-armed wolf', a warrior rescued from the brink of death. Sworn to protect a young lord with an ancient bloodline, you face numerous brutal enemies, including the menacing Ashina clan. When the young lord is captured, nothing will stop you on a perilous quest to regain your honor, not even death itself.
smail_info: Experience Sekiro's Shadows Die Twice!

Name: Forza Horizon 5
description: A dream Horizon adventure awaits you. Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless driving fun and hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.
smail_info: Experience Forza Horizon 5!

Name: EA SPORTS FC24
description: With over 19,000 fully licensed players, 700+ teams, 30+ leagues, and 300+ global partners, EA SPORTS FC 24 delivers the most immersive football experience yet in the world’s game.
smail_info: Experience EA SPORTS FC24!

Name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Become Geralt of Rivia, a professional monster hunter for hire. Explore a war-torn, monster-infested continent and track down the child of prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world. Updated to the latest version, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt includes full Korean voice acting (fully dubbed), an in-built photo mode, and additional content inspired by The Witcher Netflix series (swords, armor, alternate outfits, etc.), as well as all the additional content released for The Witcher 3.
smail_info: Experience The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt!

Name: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike has provided a platform for millions of players worldwide to engage in high-level competition for over 20 years. And now, with Counter-Strike 2, a new era of CS is about to begin.
smail_info: Experience Counter-Strike 2!

Name: RimWorld
description: RimWorld is a story generator. It's designed to co-author tragic, twisted, and triumphant stories about imprisoned pirates, desperate colonists, and starvation. RimWorld manages the 'random' events that the story throws at you. Every thunderstorm, pirate raid, and traveling salesman is a card dealt into your story by the AI Storyteller. You can choose from several different storytellers. Randy Random does crazy stuff, Cassandra Classic goes for rising tension, and Phoebe Chillax likes to relax.
smail_info: Experience RimWorld!

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
description: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.
smail_info: Experience Euro Truck Simulator 2!

Name: Lethal Company
description: You are a contracted worker for the Company. Your job is to collect scrap from abandoned, industrialized moons to meet the Company's profit quota. You can use the cash you earn to travel to new moons with higher risks and rewards--or you can buy fancy suits and decorations for your ship. Experience nature, scanning any creature you find to add them to your bestiary. Explore the wondrous outdoors and rummage through their derelict, steel and concrete underbellies. Just never miss the quota.
smail_info: Experience Lethal Company!

Name: SANABI
description: A retired soldier armed with a mechanical arm climbs the corrupted private city of a colossal conglomerate. To uncover the secrets hidden in the city and to find 'SANABI' for revenge. SANABI is a dynamic and stylish 2D chain action-adventure platformer game set in a cyberpunk dystopia.
smail_info: Experience SANABI!

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: When Isaac’s mother starts hearing the voice of God demanding a sacrifice be made to prove her faith, Isaac escapes into the basement facing droves of deranged enemies, lost brothers and sisters, his fears, and eventually his mother.
smail_info: Experience The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth!

Name: War Thunder
description: War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armored vehicles, and naval craft from World War II and the Cold War. Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea, fighting with millions of players from all over the world in an ever-evolving environment.
smail_info: Experience War Thunder!

Name: Jurassic World Evolution 2
description: Jurassic World Evolution 2 is the much-anticipated sequel to Frontier’s ground-breaking 2018 management simulation, Jurassic World Evolution. It introduces a compelling, new narrative campaign, incredible new features, and awe-inspiring new dinosaurs brought to life with captivating authenticity.
smail_info: Experience Jurassic World Evolution 2!

Name: Monster Hunter: World
description: Experience a living, breathing ecosystem in Monster Hunter: World, where players hunt down ferocious beasts and develop their skills to become the ultimate hunter. Utilize the surrounding environment and wildlife to gain the upper hand in battle. Embark on the ultimate hunting adventure.
smail_info: Experience Monster Hunter: World!

Name: Lies of P
description: Lies of P is a dark fairy tale action soulslike game that reinterprets the adventures of Pinocchio set in the elegant and captivating Belle Epoque era. Discover what awaits you at the end of your journey that began as Geppetto's puppet.
smail_info: Experience Heroes: Alyx!

Name: Total War: WARHAMMER III
description: The dying god's final cry tears the boundary between worlds, opening a portal to the Realm of Chaos. The four Ruinous Powers—Khorne, Nurgle, Tzeentch, and Slaanesh—spread darkness and despair from the maelstrom.
smail_info: The fierce conclusion to the Total War: WARHAMMER trilogy has arrived. Gather your forces and enter the Realm of Chaos. In this terror-filled place, the fate of the world will be decided. Will you conquer your daemons... or command them?

Name: GrandChase
description: GrandChase is a side-scrolling online action RPG game with anime-style graphics. Choose your favorite character, grow them, and fight against the threats to Ernas! Take on dungeons solo or with allies and face powerful enemies.
smail_info: GrandChase is a free-to-play side-scrolling online action RPG game with anime-style visuals. Enjoy thrilling action in dungeons and battles with unique characters.

Name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: Test your fate in Assassin's Creed Odyssey. From outcast to living legend, embark on an odyssey to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of ancient Greece.
smail_info: Test your fate in Assassin's Creed Odyssey!

Name: Warframe
description: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and fight alongside your friends in this story-driven, free-to-play online action game. Battle across the solar system against warring factions, level up your Warframe, build a devastating arsenal, and discover your true potential in an expansive open world.
smail_info: Become a powerful warrior.

Name: Street Fighter 6
description: The latest title in the series, Street Fighter 6, will be released on June 2, 2023! Developed with RE ENGINE, this game features the major modes 'World Tour,' 'Fighting Ground,' and 'Battle Hub.' The new Street Fighter offers experiences never seen in the series before.
smail_info: Experience the new Street Fighter with experiences never seen in the series before.

Name: It Takes Two Friend's Pass
description: Download the Friend's Pass and play It Takes Two with a friend for free! Download the Friend's Pass for free from a friend who owns the full game and play together!
smail_info: If you own the full version of It Takes Two, you can play together using the Friend's Pass.

Name: Manor Lords
description: Manor Lords is a medieval strategy game that blends detailed city-building, large-scale tactical battles, and intricate economic and social simulations. Experience the life of a medieval lord as you rule your land through seasons and weather changes, with your city rising and falling.
smail_info: Manor Lords is a strategy game where you can experience the life of a medieval lord.

Name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
description: Kazuma Kiryu, a man who has climbed from the bottom once more, and Ichiban Kasuga, a man facing the fight of his life. This epic RPG showcases the best drama of the series. The battle evolves into a 'New Live Command RPG Battle' with more strategic elements. For the first time, the stage is set overseas in 'Hawaii'!
smail_info: An epic RPG featuring the best drama of the series with two protagonists.

Name: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation
description: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation is the world's best strategy game, the world's best fighting game, and the world's most beloved game. Experience the festival of beauty and strength as the owner of 'Venus Islands' while assisting characters in the 'Venus Festival'.
smail_info: Experience the festival of beauty and strength in DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation.

Name: Frostpunk
description: Frostpunk is the first society survival game. As the leader of the last city on Earth, you must manage both your citizens and the infrastructure.
smail_info: Frostpunk is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game. What decisions will you make to ensure the survival of society? How will you change when pushed to the limit?

Name: Hero's Land
description: Hero's Land is the world's best strategy game, and the adventure starts now! Endless resources and monsters await you outside the safe zone! Take items from your warehouse and backpack, sell loot to level up your hero! Earn gold through various quests!
smail_info: Hero's Land is a multiplayer roguelike PVPVE game. In the monster world, the only thing that matters is survival, and you lose everything if you die!

Name: Raft
description: Alone or with friends, your mission is to survive an epic oceanic adventure across a perilous sea! Gather debris to survive, expand your raft, and set sail towards forgotten and dangerous islands!
smail_info: Raft is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Enshrouded
description: Enshrouded is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: In Enshrouded, you are born from the flames and are the last hope of a fading race.

Name: Supermarket Simulator
description: Supermarket Simulator is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Supermarket Simulator is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: EZ2ON REBOOT : R
description: EZ2ON REBOOT : R is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: EZ2ON REBOOT : R is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: A Little to the Left
description: A Little to the Left is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: A Little to the Left is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: The Last of Us Part I
description: The Last of Us Part I is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: The Last of Us Part I is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: V Rising
description: V Rising is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: V Rising is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is a sophisticated tactical team-based shooter where strategy and skill determine the outcome.
smail_info: Experience combat with top-tier destructive equipment and new attack styles.

Name: Overwatch 2
description: Overwatch 2 is a team-based shooter game acclaimed by critics. Set in an optimistic future, it features new heroes regularly. Team up with friends and play now.
smail_info: Team up with friends and play now.

Name: Party Animals
description: Party Animals is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Party Animals is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Persona 3 Reload
description: Persona 3 Reload is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: The protagonist, who transferred to Gekkoukan High School on the artificial island of Port Island in Minato Ward for some reason, is attacked by mysterious monsters a few days after moving into the dormitory.

Name: Horizon Forbidden West Complete Edition
description: The protagonist, who transferred to Gekkoukan High School on the artificial island of Port Island in Minato Ward for some reason, is attacked by mysterious monsters a few days after moving into the dormitory.
smail_info: Persona 3 has been newly remade and reborn on the latest current hardware!

Name: God of War
description: Leaving behind his vengeance against the gods of Olympus, Kratos now lives in the realm of Norse gods and monsters. In this harsh, unforgiving world, he must fight to survive and teach his son to do the same.
smail_info: Enter the realm of Norse mythology.

Name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord
description: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: HELLDIVERS 2
description: HELLDIVERS 2 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: HELLDIVERS 2 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Hearts of Iron IV
description: Hearts of Iron IV is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Hearts of Iron IV is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: It Takes Two
description: Embark on a wild journey in It Takes Two. Invite a friend to join for free with the Friend's Pass* and work together to overcome a variety of hilarious and innovative gameplay challenges.
smail_info: Perfect co-op play.

Name: Back 4 Blood
description: Back 4 Blood is a thrilling first-person co-op shooter game from the creators of the critically acclaimed Left 4 Dead franchise. Experience a robust 4-player co-op campaign, competitive multiplayer as human or Ridden, and frenetic gameplay that keeps you in the action.
smail_info: Lead your team in battle alone.

Name: Sons Of The Forest
description: Sons Of The Forest is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Sons Of The Forest is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Dead by Daylight
description: Dead by Daylight is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Dead by Daylight is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Don't Starve Together
description: Explore a strange world full of odd creatures, dangers, and mysteries. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Discover the mysteries of the peculiar land as you play.
smail_info: Don't Starve Together is the standalone multiplayer expansion of the uncompromising survival game, Don't Starve.

Name: Crusader Kings III
description: Love, fight, scheme, and claim greatness. Determine your noble house's legacy in the sprawling grand strategy game Crusader Kings III. With a rich and vivid medieval simulation, ensure the legacy of your royal house in a game where death is only the beginning.
smail_info: Experience the combination of grand strategy games and deep, dramatic medieval role-playing.

Name: Winter Memories
description: Winter Memories is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Winter Memories is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Diablo IV
description: Join the fight for Sanctuary in Diablo® IV, the ultimate action RPG adventure. Experience the highly acclaimed campaign and new seasonal content.
smail_info: Welcome to Hell.

Name: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne
description: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne expands the hunting action with new Master Rank quests and new elements. Each of the 14 weapon types has unique characteristics, and the new Clutch Claw allows players to grapple onto monsters, controlling their movements.
smail_info: Deepening hunting action.

Name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint
description: Become an elite spec ops soldier known as a Ghost, tasked with a special mission in Auroa. Skell Technology has turned against you, and now a group of rogue spec ops soldiers, led by your former comrade, have taken over the island. Lead your team and save the civilians while avoiding enemy detection.
smail_info: In the latest Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon, become a Ghost and fight against the rogue spec ops soldiers known as Wolves!

Name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE
description: Dynamic hunting instinct! Experience new actions that bring a new breeze to hunting with free movement across fields and new monsters that bring excitement and surprises. The hunting experience like never before awaits hunters in MONSTER HUNTER RISE!
smail_info: Dynamic hunting instinct!

Name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
description: The story of defense attorney Apollo Justice is brilliantly revived! The three popular titles featuring the rookie lawyer Apollo Justice and the legendary lawyer Phoenix Wright are now together in one new package! Includes all 14 episodes from Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney 4, 5, and 6, plus two special episodes as downloadable content for a total of 16 episodes!
smail_info: The story of defense attorney Apollo Justice is brilliantly revived!

Name: Battlefield 2042
description: Battlefield 2042 begins the all-out battle in Season 7: Turning Point. Battlefield™ 2042 is a first-person shooter that marks the return to the franchise’s iconic all-out warfare.
smail_info: Join intense and immersive multiplayer battles supported by an arsenal.

Name: Escape the Backrooms
description: Escape the Backrooms is a 1-4 player cooperative horror exploration game. Traverse eerie levels, avoid ghosts and other dangers, and try to escape. Free content updates with new levels and game modes reward the community.
smail_info: Each level offers various ways to avoid dangers and escape.

Name: Overcooked! 2
description: The chaotic cooking action of Overcooked is back! Embark on a journey to return to the Onion Kingdom. Play in classic co-op or online multiplayer with up to four chefs. Get your aprons ready...
smail_info: It's time to save the world again!

Name: Fallout 4
description: Fallout 4 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Fallout 4 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Bloons TD 6
description: Bloons TD 6 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Bloons TD 6 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Halo The Master Chief Collection
description: Halo The Master Chief Collection is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Halo The Master Chief Collection is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Cuphead is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: XBPlay
description: XBPlay is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: XBPlay is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: BeamNG.drive
description: BeamNG.drive is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: BeamNG.drive is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Coral Island
description: Coral Island is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.
smail_info: Coral Island is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: NBA 2K24
description: NBA 2K24 is the world's best strategy game, the world's best combat game, and the world's most beloved game.

Name: Apex Legends™
description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero shooter game from Respawn Entertainment that boasts various awards. Master the powerful abilities of ever-expanding Legend characters and experience the innovation of tactical squad play, evolving gameplay, hero shooter, and battle royale.
smail_info: Play the newly evolved hero shooter.

Name: Half-Life Alyx
description: Half-Life: Alyx is a new VR game from Valve set in the Half-Life series. It takes place between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2, involving an impossible fight against an evil alien race called the Combine. As Alyx Vance, you are humanity's only hope for survival.
smail_info: Play the newly evolved hero shooter.

Name: Brawlhalla
description: Brawlhalla is an epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or locally. Engage in casual brawls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android, and Steam! Regularly updated. Over 60 legends available.
smail_info: Play the newly evolved hero shooter.

Name: Railway Empire 2
description: In the early 1800s, become a shrewd entrepreneur armed with steam engines and set up a small train company to drive the economy. Grow your company into the largest train company on the continent, outmaneuver competitors, and expand your transport network by building tracks, bridges, tunnels, and more.
smail_info: Play the newly evolved hero shooter.

Name: Farming Simulator 22
description: Become a modern farmer! Agriculture, animal husbandry, and forestry offer a wide variety of farming activities. Overcome the challenges of the seasons, especially beware of winter. Build your farm creatively with production chains and expand your agricultural business. Rise to become an agricultural empire! Run a farm with friends and enjoy cross-platform multiplayer.
smail_info: Create your farm and enjoy farming! Harvest crops, care for animals, manage production, and overcome seasonal challenges.

Name: Cities Skylines
description: Cities Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new gameplay elements to realize the thrill and difficulties of creating and maintaining a real city while expanding on well-established tropes of the city-building experience.
smail_info: Play the newly evolved hero shooter.

Name: Phasmophobia
description: Phasmophobia is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game. With supernatural activity on the rise, it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost-hunting equipment at your disposal to gather as much evidence as possible.
smail_info: Phasmophobia is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game.
